applyTo: "**"
---

- Follow established style guides, keep code small, modular, and well-named.
- Document all public APIs; validate inputs and handle errors clearly.
- Prefer reusable modules; avoid globals.
- Ensure tests, reproducibility, and meaningful commits.
- Prioritize readability and maintainability over early optimization.
- All code and comments must be in English only, no exceptions.
